scripts.test:chrome: cross-env BROWSER=chromium HEADLESS=false npx --require-module ts-node/register --require support/world.ts --require support/hooks.ts --require steps/**/*.ts
scripts.test:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox HEADLESS=false npx --require-module ts-node/register --require support/world.ts --require support/hooks.ts --require steps/**/*.ts
scripts.test:edge: cross-env BROWSER=edge HEADLESS=false npx --require-module ts-node/register --require support/world.ts --require support/hooks.ts --require steps/**/*.ts
scripts.test:ui-debug: cross-env BROWSER=chromium HEADLESS=false DEBUG_MODE=true PWDEBUG=1 npx features/**/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require support/world.ts --require support/hooks.ts --require steps/**/*.ts
scripts.test:report:chromium: cross-env BROWSER=chromium HEADLESS=true npx  --require-module ts-node/register --require support/world.ts --require support/hooks.ts --require steps/**/*.ts --format json:test-results/json/report-chromium.json
